edu.purdue.cs.barista

Annotation Type TestCase


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface TestCase
    The TestCase annotation allows test methods to be used in Gradescope testing. It attaches to JUnit test methods and forwards the results and the annotation parameters to Gradescope. TestCase methods should be contained in a TestSuite class.

    The following optional parameters may be used:

    • String name - the name of the test
    • String number - the number of the test
    • double maxScore - how many points the test is worth
    • TestCase.Visibility visibility - the visibility level of the test, options for visibility are:
      • VISIBLE (default) - the test case results will always be shown to students
      • AFTER_PUBLISH - the test case results will be shown after grades are published
      • AFTER_DUE - the test case results will be shown after the due date has passed
      • HIDDEN - the test case results will never be shown to students
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0, 10/17/2019
    Author:
    Andrew Davis, drew@drewdavis.me

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements

      • name

        public abstract String name
